name: Artificial Bar
description:
STORY

You are the only human left, your job is to make coffee for the robots collaborating with your artificial companion Coffy while avoiding receiving too many bad customer reviews!

CONTROLS

Use SPACE to ENTER,

WASD to MOVE,

E to USE

HOW TO PLAY

You have to collaborate with Coffy to make coffee, and deliver it to customers before they get mad and write you a bad review while avoiding the oil stains on the ground! 

You lose if your bar has 0 stars or if you can't make at least 150 bucks (the minimum to keep a bar, you know, with the crisis...) before the day is over! Each day lasts 60 seconds. You will be stunned for about 3 seconds if you stumble upon oil stains (my advice is NOT to trip over oil stains) which change their position from time to time.

 Also because you didn't want to pay the expensive costs for repairing Coffy it will break after some time! Guess who is going to repair it?

CREDITS

Made by Cactus, Traba, and Lorix for the Wowie Jam 4.0 using Raise, a custom game engine made in c++,

most of the sounds are from freesound and fesliyanstudios. The music used is Ersatz Bossa - John Deley and the 41 Players.
